response.overview: A newly married couple with the dream of getting a job went to outing. Husband Inkwon headed to obstetrics when Wife Bojung suddenly did virginal bloody discharge. Medical doctor recommended the hospitalization because of the danger of miscarriage. Bojung's mother, Gilja, received a warning from a supervisor who manages CCTV because she was talking over the phone with Inkwon while working in a big building. Gilja was arguing with the supervisor as she was calling to Inkwon again and headed straight to the hospital. Inkwon, who found out that he lost his wallet in the hospital, asked the hospital to cooperate after he knew about CCTV in the ceiling with Gilja. Camera was broken though a hospital employee boasted about the camera conversely and then this situation started to get twisted. But still, Bojung did the miscarriage eventually after she asked for the help alone in the ward....
response.title: Her Story Taking
